titleStmt.title: By the King, His Majesties proclamation concerning the bringing in of armes to his magazine in the citty of Worcester
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford, this fourteenth day of December, in the eighteenth yeare of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
